news_header: A plane crash involving a passenger plane and a helicopter near Washington resulted in multiple fatalities.
news_text: A tragic incident occurred when a passenger plane crashed into a helicopter near the Potomac River, resulting in 64 people on the plane and three on the helicopter. Among the passengers were figure skaters and members of a youth development program. Eighteen victims have been recovered so far. This could be the deadliest aviation accident in the U.S. in over 20 years.
